ingredients.ingredient: 1 (19 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
10 ounces fresh spinach, washed and chopped

cookingTips: Drain and rinse canned beans to reduce sodium and improve texture
Add spinach at the end of cooking to preserve nutrients and color
Use Italian-style tomatoes for added herbs and depth
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This one-pot pasta combines legumes for protein and fiber. What liquid adjustments might you need if the mixture becomes too thick during cooking?
